data.title: Extreme Deconvolution: Density Estimation using Gaussian Mixtures in the Presence of Noisy, Heterogeneous and Incomplete Data
data.name: extreme-deconvolution
data.description: Density estimation using Gaussian mixtures in the presence of noisy, heterogeneous and incomplete data

evidence: "The installation can produce two things: (1) a shared library which can be called from other programs ... (2) a 'main' program which runs on input files."
"The C-code implementing the algorithm can be called from other C-programs by using the shared object library. The main function for this purpose is the 'proj_gauss_mixtures' function."

"The algorithm that the code implements is described in the paper 'Extreme deconvolution: inferring complete distribution functions from noisy, heterogeneous and incomplete observations' ... If you use the code, please cite this paper"
